ygData.subject: Thieves and meanies!
ygData.msgSnippet: Maybe not appropriate here, but it sickens me...I have been playing EQ since release, and I am very discouraged with the change of the attitudes of most people
ygData.messageBody:
Maybe not appropriate here, but it sickens me...I
have been playing EQ since release, and I am very
discouraged with the change of the attitudes of most people
that play now. To make it short...A guy/friend of mine
in my guild for about 8 months wanted to borrow my
Talon's Bracer, cuz i wasn't really playing my ranger at
the time, i said sure, just want it back sometime in
the near future. Well, a few months later I asked for
it back, he said np, come to KC...I said i cannot i
have to log, will get it tomorrow, he said np. WELL!!!
he never logged on for 3 days, and when he did, he
left my guild and stole my F'n bracer! Maybe a bit
stupid on my part, but 2 years ago, I would have been
hard pressed to find someone to pull that shit!
sigh.....not to mention 40 attempts yesterday on my account
being hacked! WTF. okay lol i will calm down now =)
